Literature.Title: Antimicrobial properties of derivatives of the cationic tryptophan-rich hexapeptide PAF26

Sequence Information.Comments: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is 83.33% similar toPAF26. W=K: 33%, F=A: 17%.Activity: inhibited fungus P. digitatum (IC50 5.6 uM) cf WT (IC50 2.2 uM).
